long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anole is a free productivity extension for Chrome that aims to assist users with all sorts of string transformations via selected text and the clipboard.

Anole provides features to convert any selected string into special case like CamelCase, kebab-case, Start Case, snake_case, and so on.

As of version 1.3.0 Anole supports translit of Cyrillic text to English. 

As of version 1.2.0 Anole provides a Lorem ipsum generator for placeholder text that will be generated directly onto your clipboard..

More cases and additional features (e.g. transform templates) will follow.
